title: GHL CRM Setup & Automations
job_overview:
???? Hiring: Virtual Assistant with GoHighLevel + Zapier Automation Skills

We’re looking for a tech-savvy, detail-oriented VA to help us build and automate systems and processes for our US based home services company.

? You MUST have experience with:

GoHighLevel (CRM setup, workflows, pipelines, campaigns)

Zapier (automations and custom workflows)

Light API integration work (connecting tools, understanding webhook logic)

???? What you’ll do:

Build and manage automations to streamline operations

Optimize CRM setup for lead tracking and nurture flows

Connect tools and platforms via Zapier and API/webhooks

Troubleshoot and improve existing systems

???? Bonus if you have:

Experience with lead generation funnels

Familiarity with tools like Slack, Google Sheets, Trello, Asana, etc.

Clear written communication and initiative

???? Hours: Part-time to start, with potential to grow
???? Location: Remote – we work async, but quick responses are a plus
???? Pay: Competitive based on experience

To apply:
Send your resume and a quick Loom video (2-3 min) introducing yourself with camera on and sharing examples of GHL or automation work you’ve done.
